description: Buy 1 Bird Feeder Decoration (in fun stuff!)
Get a 3-star rating for your Pet Hotel!
Get a 4-star rating for your Pet Hotel!
Get a 5-star rating for your Pet Hotel!
Help out 3 neighbors by tapping on their coins!
Get the Door Greeter social rank by visiting neighbors and tapping their coins!
Make 40 neighbors happy within 7 days by tapping their coins
Pop 8 Heart Balloons for your Panda to show it some love!
Build one of the Party Rooms!
Send your Panda and Puppy to one of your Party Rooms to have some fun!
Cook once in any of your Kitchens!
Add two food items to your food storage bowl so you can feed your Panda!
Go to the Guestbook and tap 'Complete' under your Panda!
Get another pee wee panda kid!
Buy a desert background (in fun stuff and then backgrounds)!
Get 2 more kids for your hotel!
Pop 3 Balloons in 1 day or less!
Pop 20 Balloons in 1 day or less!
Pop 50 Balloons in 1 week or less!
Pop 100 Balloons in 1 week or less!
Tap on 3 Heart Balloons in 1 day or less!
Tap on 10 Heart Balloons in 1 day or less!
Tap on 50 Heart Balloons in 2 days or less!
Tap on 200 Heart Balloons in 7 days or less!
Build 2 Pet Rooms that have 2 different types of dogs in them!
Build 3 Pet Rooms that a water loving animal could love!
Get 3 Pet Rooms that have stone age animals!
Get the Cave Art fun room
Build 2 different rooms with bugs in them
Add Ball Girl Ikumi to your staff
Place the Sky room in your Hotel
Expand your Hotel in any direction
Achieve a Hotel Size Rating of 4
Build the Beach room for a fun summer trip!
Make ten neighbors happy to build excitement!
Collect the daily bonus 3 times in a row for extra beach cash!
Get the hanglider for some extreme fun!
Get 2 Sandy Path connectors for easy walking
Hire Cleaner Ellen to rinse off the sandy pets!
Build the feeding room so the hungry pets can feast!
Make 10 neighbors happy as a goodbye gift!
Pop 40 happy balloons for extra smiles!
Kids love kimchi! Get 2 Asian Bear Kids
Collect the Daily Bonus 3 days in a row for the exchange rate!
Get a telescope to spot the Taj Majal
Build an Ice Flows room to unlock the polar bear!
Get a fan connector to cool things down
Get the snow background to make a Winter Wonderland!
Pop 20 heart balloons to spread the motherly love!
Get the Cave Art room for hibernation!
Get a Fun Room rating of 4 or higher to spice up the long winter!
Build a wood cabin for the staff!
Get a chimney decoration to heat things up!
